title: [Citadel, Hallway]
description: This portion of the hallway is extremely long.  The corridor is well-lit, the light of day streaming in through numerous evenly spaced windows.  A large tapestry hangs on the inner wall.

This portion of the hallway is extremely long.  A tall caretaker is carefully lighting sconces, the illumination of the corridor growing with each new light.  A large tapestry hangs on the inner wall.
